fonts.description: Mixin whose objective is to create a source starting from an established route

context.name: font-face

fonts.description:
Variable path by default of the sources defined in the .frontech.json file.
To modify the path, simply set the variable in the import as follows: @use '~@front-tech/design-systems-utils/library/web/abstracts' with ($font-path:'public/assets/fonts/');

usedBy.description: Mixin whose objective is to create a source starting from an established route

context.name: font-face

grid.description: Dynamically created map based on the configuration file. Define the breakpoints of the different breakpoints

context.name: breakpoints
context.value:
(
                    sm:(
                gutter:30px,
                offset:50px,
                columns:4,
                width:360px
              ),md:(
                gutter:30px,
                offset:50px,
                columns:6,
                width:768px
              ),lg:(
                gutter:30px,
                offset:50px,
                columns:12,
                width:1440px
              ),
                )

rem.description: Variable that defines the reference unit in order to transform px into rem. By default 16px. To modify the size, simply set the variable in the import as follows: @use '~@front-tech/design-systems-utils/library/web/abstracts' with ($rem-baseline: 10px);

usedBy.description: Mixin that based on the $rem-baseline variable returns the percentage to which the font-size must attend. By default it is declared in the html selector of the library

context.name: rem-baseline
context.code: font-size: (math.div($zoom,16px)) * general.$rem-baseline;

usedBy.description: Function that returns the value of the pixels in rem.

context.name: rem-convert

rem.description: Variable that transforms pixels into rem for browsers that support rem as well as if they do not. By default false.

usedBy.description: Mixin that transforms the pixels into rem of the CSS properties entered as arguments. If the $rem-px-only variable is set to true, Internet Explorer 9 compatibility applies.

context.name: rem

rem.description: Variable that provides compatibility with Internet Explorer 9 and does not convert pixels into rem, as it is not compatible. By default, it is false.

usedBy.description: Function that transforms pixels into rem. If the $rem-px-only variable is set to true, Internet Explorer 9 compatibility applies.

context.name: rem

usedBy.description: Mixin that transforms the pixels into rem of the CSS properties entered as arguments. If the $rem-px-only variable is set to true, Internet Explorer 9 compatibility applies.

context.name: rem

rem.description: Function that, given a list of properties, returns them separated by the corresponding separator character

spacing.description: Dynamically created map based on the configuration file. Define the attributes to create the margin and padding utility classes

usedBy.description: Mixin that, starting from the breakpoints established in the configuration file, generates the classes of the grid system.

context.name: get-utilities-spacing

spacing.description: Map that defines the prefix of the CSS class and property of the margins and padding mixin

context.name: types
context.value:
(
  mt: margin-top,
  mr: margin-right,
  mb: margin-bottom,
  ml: margin-left,
  pt: padding-top,
  pr: padding-right,
  pb: padding-bottom,
  pl: padding-left
)
